query:
SELECT * FROM (
                SELECT
                    bakers.id as id
                FROM bakers
                WHERE self_suspended IS NOT NULL OR inactive_suspended IS NOT NULL AND
                    id > $1 AND id < $2
                ORDER BY
                    (CASE WHEN $4 THEN bakers.id END) DESC,
                    (CASE WHEN NOT $4 THEN bakers.id END) ASC
                LIMIT $3
            ) AS suspended_bakers
            ORDER BY suspended_bakers.id ASC
